title: Catherine Tyldesley Strictly Come Dancing exit: Michelle Visage off camera reaction
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Michelle Visage was all of us as Catherine Tyldesley was booted off Strictly Come Dancing last night alongside her fabulous partner, Johannes Radebe.

The former Coronation Street star was tipped to leave by punters last week, despite receiving praise from both judges and fans alike.

And it turns out they were bang on as Cath was ejected out of Strictly Come Dancing over Mike Bushell in another controversial dance-off, which has sparked one more online tirade against Strictly Come Dancing judges Shirley Ballas, Crag Revel Horwood, Bruno Tonioli and Motsi Mabuse.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘I’m telling you if they’d kept the camera on me my jaw was on the ground,’ Michelle told Lorraine during the host’s show today.

‘I don’t know. It just goes to show you can’t rely on your favourite people, we rely on that. Giovanni and I are very grateful to everybody’s who’s been voting us though. I am having the time of my life!

‘Catherine and Johannes are two of my closest friends in this competition; so sad to see them go.’

Though, the Drag Race UK judge assured: ‘Cath is on top of the world; she’s just excited she made it to Halloween Week.’

Following her shock elimination, Catherine praised Johannes for becoming her ‘best friend’.

Catherine and Johannes became the fifth couple to be eliminated from Strictly Come Dancing (Picture: BBC)

‘He’s just…oooh, (referring to eye make-up) it’s waterproof…just the opportunity to work with amazing people and get critiqued off amazing people,’ she told host Tess Daly.

‘I never thought I’d say this, I’m going to keep it up because I fell in love with it! I’ve loved every second, this man has changed my life.’

Earlier this month, fans went ballistic as the Strictly judges axed Dev Griffin.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Strictly Come Dancing continues Saturday on BBC One.

description: Michelle Visage reveals off-camera reaction to Catherine Tyldesley Strictly Come Dancing exit
